item.title: Zeroing and Cutting
item.description: Once you have the file, and have secured your material and warmed up the machine, open the shopbot app and make sure you’re in shopbot easy mode. Image Then open the manual controll panel by clicking the yellow box Image You will zero the X and Y at the same time. Before you zero the X and Y, make sure the piece of wood (or other material) is in the machine, not crooked, and is held down in some way.

item.title: Troubleshooting
item.description: The two most common things to go wrong are a USB Control Box Problem or True Zero getting reset wrong USB Control Box Problems A USB control box problem happens when there is a yellow box on the computer that says there’s a “USB control box problem!”. Image When there is a USB control box problem, it usually means there has been a problem with the power. Reset the power box, and then press “retry control box” on the computer.
